comments:
Integration build 1028.

1) create a webproject
2) run on server
3) close workbench
4) open workbench
5) run on server / or create another webproject

The Runtime manager isnt initalized with existing runtimes. When the
ProjectFacet tries to resolve the runtime type ie "Apache Tomcat"
an illegal exception is thrown.


*** ERROR ***: Wed Nov 02 16:17:16 EST 2005   
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Could not find runtime Apache Tomcat v3.2.

Cannot reproduce. I think this was a dup of another facet bug that was fixed
last week.
This change is a bulk update of all _un_targeted, fixed, resolved bugs upon release of M5. This particular bug _might_ have been fixed earlier than M5. (Feel free to correct).

This is part of a mass update to close out all stale WTP defects already verified by the reporter but awaiting closure by the assignee.  If you feel this defect was closed inappropriately, please reopen.

Thanks, John Lanuti
